docs.lead_paragraph: Administration officials are divided over what to do about a detainee who has been on a hunger strike since 2007.

headline.main: Guantánamo Hunger Striker’s Petition Divides Officials
headline.print_headline: Guantánamo Hunger Striker’s Petition Divides Officials

docs.abstract: Obama administration officials are divided over what to do about Guantanamo Bay detainee Tariq Ba Oda, who has been on hunger strike since Feb 2007 and now weighs less than 75 pounds; some say that government should not oppose his release, citing his medical condition, while others say releasing Ba Oda would create incentive for other detainees to model his tactics.
docs.snippet: Administration officials are divided over what to do about a detainee who has been on a hunger strike since 2007.
